text: is a 2023 Japanese movie written and directed by Daisuke Miura and starring Taisuke Fujigaya, Atsuko Maeda, Akiyoshi Nakao, Mieko Harada and Etsushi Toyokawa. It was released on 13 January 2023. == Cast == * Taisuke Fujigaya as Yūsuke Sugawara * Atsuko Maeda as Maho Yonaga * Akiyoshi Nakao * Mieko Harada * Etsushi Toyokawa * Karina Nose * Shūhei Nomura as Katō == Production == The film was announced in March 2021. The trailer of the film was released on 29 December 2022. == Release == The film was screened at the 35th Tokyo International Film Festival on 28 October 2022 and Hawaii International Film Festival on 5 April 2023. == Reception == James Hadfield for The Japan Times and Wendy Ide of Screen Daily reviewed the film. == References == == Other websites == *
title: And So I'm at a Loss
